name: Five Nights At Mannequin's
description:
Are you ready for five nights at MMC "Mannequin Making Company". Night shift starts with completing the work orders on time and finding the lost mannequin parts. Complete the tasks on time at each night and they get complicated at each level. Your survival depends on power available but that is very limited so use it wisely. Sensor device is provided to make you aware of the presence of mannequin and take appropriate action right away before she comes out of her hidden place and finds you. After this you can either look directly into her eyes to make her stop moving or push the fire alarm switch to scare her away for a short period of time but she will come back.

- Download now and dare to play this best horror game of 2023.
